Field.CDATA: [PXDBInt] [PXUIField(DisplayName="City")] [PXSelector(typeof(Search< CityMunicipality.cityMunCode, Where2< Where<CityMunicipality.provinceCode, Equal<Current<UnboundTable.unboundProvince>>, Or<Current<UnboundTable.unboundProvince>, IsNull>>, And<Where<CityMunicipality.regionCode, Equal<Current<UnboundTable.unboundRegion>>, And<Current<UnboundTable.unboundRegion>, IsNotNull>>>>>), SubstituteKey = typeof(CityMunicipality.cityMunName), ValidateValue = false)]

[PXDBInt] [PXUIField(DisplayName="Brgy")] using PSGC; [PXSelector(typeof(Search< Brgy.brgyCode, Where2< Where<Brgy.cityMunCode, Equal<Current<UnboundTable.unboundCity>>, And<Current<UnboundTable.unboundCity>, IsNotNull>>, And2< Where<Brgy.provinceCode, Equal<Current<UnboundTable.unboundProvince>>, Or<Current<UnboundTable.unboundProvince>, IsNull>>, And<Where<Brgy.subMunCode, Equal<Current<UnboundTable.unboundSubCity>>, Or<Current<UnboundTable.unboundSubCity>, IsNull>>>>>>), SubstituteKey = typeof(Brgy.brgyName),ValidateValue = false)]
